mapper.select: SELECT A.w_date, IFNULL(LEFT(A.w_sdatetime,19),'') AS w_sdatetime, IFNULL(LEFT(A.w_edatetime,19),'') AS w_edatetime, IFNULL(LEFT(A.w_in_edatetime,19),'') AS w_in_edatetime, A.w_pnum, B.item_name AS w_pname, A.w_incnt, A.w_weight, B.steel_grade AS w_gang, B.t_grade AS w_t_gb, B.apply_cp AS w_cp, B.apply_temp1 AS w_qf, B.apply_temp2 AS w_tf, B.std_load AS w_std_weight, A.w_lot, C.h_val1, C.h_val2, C.h_val3, CASE WHEN w_in_edatetime IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,w_sdatetime, w_in_edatetime) END AS w_intime, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY regtime) AS w_idx FROM tb_worklist A LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_standard AS B ON A.w_pnum = B.item_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_hardness AS C ON A.w_lot = C.h_wlot WHERE A.w_date = #{w_date}
SELECT * FROM tb_worklist WHERE 1=1 AND w_lot = #{w_lot}

SELECT item_no AS w_pnum, item_name AS w_pname, steel_grade AS w_gang, t_grade AS w_t_gb, apply_temp1 AS w_qf, apply_temp2 AS w_tf, apply_cp AS w_cp, std_load AS w_std_weight, hardness_req AS w_hardness FROM tb_standard WHERE 1=1
AND item_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{w_pnum},'%')
AND steel_grade LIKE CONCAT('%',#{w_gang},'%')
AND t_grade LIKE CONCAT('%',#{w_t_gb},'%')

SELECT * FROM v_alarmlist WHERE 1=1
AND a_stime >= CONCAT(#{a_sdate},' 00:00:00')
AND a_stime <= CONCAT(#{a_edate},' 23:59:59')
SELECT a_hogi, a_addr, a_desc, COUNT(*) AS a_cnt FROM v_alarmlist WHERE 1=1 AND a_stime >= CONCAT(#{a_sdate},' 00:00:00') AND a_stime <= CONCAT(#{a_edate},' 23:59:59') GROUP BY a_hogi, a_addr, a_desc

SELECT w_pnum AS m_pnum, w_pname AS m_pname, w_intime AS m_intime, w_incnt AS m_incnt, w_weight AS m_weight, w_std_weight AS m_std_weight, ROUND((w_weight / w_std_weight) * 100,1) AS m_weight_percent FROM ( SELECT machine AS w_machine, w_pnum, w_pname, SUM(in_diff) AS w_intime, SUM(w_incnt) AS w_incnt, SUM(w_weight) AS w_weight, SUM(std_load) AS w_std_weight FROM ( SELECT machine, w_pnum, item_name AS w_pname, w_date, w_sdatetime, w_in_edatetime, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, w_sdatetime, w_in_edatetime) AS in_diff, w_incnt, ROUND(w_weight,1) AS w_weight, std_load FROM tb_worklist AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT 'HT01' AS machine, CASE WHEN CAST(LEFT(curtime(),2) AS INT) < 8 THEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d 08:00:00') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 08:00:00') END AS sdatetime, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS edatetime ) AS B ON A.w_machine = B.machine LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_standard AS C ON A.w_pnum = C.item_no WHERE 1=1 AND A.w_sdatetime >= B.sdatetime AND A.w_sdatetime <= B.edatetime ) AS A GROUP BY machine, w_pnum, w_pname ) AS B
